---
title: "Table 1"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, warning = F)
```

```{r packages, include = F, cache = F}
outdir <- getSrcDirectory(function(dummy) {dummy})
setwd(outdir)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(pander)
panderOptions("table.alignment.rownames","left")
panderOptions('table.alignment.default', function(df) {
  ifelse(sapply(df, function(x) x[1] %>% as.numeric %>% is.na), 'left', 'right')
})
panderOptions("table.caption.prefix","")
```

```{r display}
colClasses <- c("character","character","numeric","numeric","numeric")
table_1 <- read.csv(file = "Table_1.csv", colClasses = colClasses)
table_1[,3] <- 1/table_1[,3]
table_1[,3:5] <- table_1[,3:5] %>% signif(3) %>% format(scientific = T)
colnames(table_1)[3] <- "Prevalence"
colnames(table_1)[4] <- '95%-CI PAF'
colnames(table_1)[5] <- "Max Penetrance"
table_1 %>% pander
```
